initialLatitude.label: Initial latitude
initialLatitude.description: The latitude of the location to center the map on initially

initialLongitude.label: Initial longitude
initialLongitude.description: The longitude of the location to center the map on initially

initialLatitudeDelta.label: Initial latitude delta
initialLatitudeDelta.description: The amount of latitude to display on the map initially (the horizontal zoom)

initialLongitudeDelta.label: Initial longitude delta
initialLongitudeDelta.description: The amount of longitude to display on the map initially (the vertical zoom)

interactionDisabled.label: Disable interaction
interactionDisabled.description: Prevent users from dragging or zooming on the map

borderRadiusMode.label: Border radius
borderRadiusMode.description: Border radius of the element - either None, Global (using theme global border radius), or Round (must specify a width and height on component)
